sk.tsystems.forum.junittests

Class CommentServicesTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.tsystems.forum.junittests.CommentServicesTests

  • public class CommentServicesTests
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains JUnit Tests which check if all methods in CommentServices work correctly.
    Author:
    karolklescinsky

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CommentServices commentServices 
      private CreatingTestingSamples sample 
      private TaskServices taskServices

      private UserServices userServices

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment()
      This method is called before each test.
      void doesMethodAddCommentToDatabaseWork()
      Checks if specific comment was created earlier under "@Before" annotation.
      void doesMethodGetCommentWork()
      Checks two comments of type String, one stored as String in class CreatingTestingSamples and another stored in database.
      void doesMethodPrintCommentsWork()
      Checks if list of comments in specific task is not null.
      void doesMethodRemoveCommentWork()
      Creates specific comment, then this test removes that specific comment and checks if that specific comment is in database.
      void doesMethodUpdateCommentWork()
      Checks two Strings, one string before calling method updateComment and another one after calling method updateComment.
      void dropTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment()
      This method is called after each test.

    • Method Detail

      • createTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment

        public void createTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment()
        This method is called before each test. Calls method createTestedUser which adds testedUser into the database. Calls method createTestedTopic which adds testedTopic into the database. Calls method createTestedTask which adds testedTask into the database. Calls method createTestedComment which adds testedComment the into database.

      • dropTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment

        public void dropTestedUserAndTestedTopicAndTestedTaskAndTestedComment()
        This method is called after each test. Calls method removeComment which drops testedComment from database. Calls method removeTask which drops testedTask from database. Calls method removeTopic which drops testedTopic from database. Calls method dropUser which drops testedUser from database.

      • doesMethodAddCommentToDatabaseWork

        public void doesMethodAddCommentToDatabaseWork()
        Checks if specific comment was created earlier under "@Before" annotation. Checks if value after calling getComment method is not null.

      • doesMethodPrintCommentsWork

        public void doesMethodPrintCommentsWork()
        Checks if list of comments in specific task is not null.

      • doesMethodRemoveCommentWork

        public void doesMethodRemoveCommentWork()
        Creates specific comment, then this test removes that specific comment and checks if that specific comment is in database. Null expected.

      • doesMethodGetCommentWork

        public void doesMethodGetCommentWork()
        Checks two comments of type String, one stored as String in class CreatingTestingSamples and another stored in database.

      • doesMethodUpdateCommentWork

        public void doesMethodUpdateCommentWork()
        Checks two Strings, one string before calling method updateComment and another one after calling method updateComment. Value should change from "testing comment" to "new comment".
